Konfig The monorepo that holds everything... Getting started Get the repository on your local machine. Takes a minute. This repository has submodules so pull all of them. Also take a few minutes. Environment Setup 1. Run Postgres as a background process 1. Setup file in to something like: Paste this into your or Then create with values from Dylan. How to run Konfig 1. Make sure is initiated in 1. Start the server with 1. Start w/ IntelliJ 1. into an SDK repo and run Making Changes See Changesets
